about.title: About KonKon
about.description: KonKon is a smart assistant designed for families. It aims to simplify communication and organize life for family members through features like shared calendars, task assignments, shopping lists, and more.

createFamily.title: Create Family
createFamily.introText:
Enter a name and description for your family.
You can invite other members later.
createFamily.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for your family
createFamily.featuresTitle: By creating a family, you can:
createFamily.featureSharedCalendar: Manage schedules with a shared calendar

familyManagement.leaveFamilyMessage: Are you sure you want to leave the family?
familyManagement.dissolveFamilyMessage: Are you sure you want to dissolve the family? This action cannot be undone.

joinFamily.title: Join Family
joinFamily.introTitle: Join a family with an invite code
joinFamily.introText: Enter the invite code shared by your family to join their group.
joinFamily.helpText1: ‚Ä¢ An alphanumeric code shared by the family owner
joinFamily.helpText2: ‚Ä¢ Required to join a family group
joinFamily.helpText3: ‚Ä¢ Once you join, you can share schedules and information with the family

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: KonKon ("we", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your personal information.
privacyPolicy.infoWeCollectContent:
To provide you with our services, we may collect the following information:
- Account Information: Email address, nickname, and password you provide during registration.
- Family Information: Family name, family member relationships, and other family member information you voluntarily enter when creating or joining a family.
- User Content: Text, images, and other content you upload when using features like the family calendar, photo album, and shopping lists.
- Device Information: We may collect your device model, operating system version, unique device identifiers, etc.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInfoContent:
We strictly adhere to legal regulations and user agreements, and use the collected information for the following purposes:
- To provide you with various service functions.
- To maintain, improve, and optimize our services.
- For identity verification, customer service, security prevention, fraud monitoring, etc.
- To recommend content that may be of interest to you.
privacyPolicy.sharingAndDisclosureContent:
We will not share your personal information with any third-party companies, organizations, or individuals, except in the following cases:
- With your explicit consent or authorization in advance.
- As required by laws and regulations, or by administrative or judicial authorities.
- To the extent permitted by law, to protect the interests, property, or safety of this application, other users, or the public from harm.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information. You can exercise these rights through the in-app settings or by contacting us.
privacyPolicy.disclaimer: *This privacy policy is a sample template and does not constitute a formal legal document. Please modify it according to your actual situation under the guidance of a legal professional.

userAgreement.title: User Agreement
userAgreement.introduction: Welcome to KonKon! This agreement is a legal agreement between you and KonKon (hereinafter referred to as "this application") regarding the download, installation, and use of this application, as well as the related services provided by this application.
userAgreement.serviceContent:
1.1 This application is a family management tool designed to help family members better communicate, coordinate, and plan family affairs.
1.2 Specific services include family calendar, member management, chore assignment, birthday reminders, family album, shopping list, family budget, and emergency contacts.
1.3 This application has the right to adjust, upgrade, or terminate parts of the service content based on business development without individual notice to users.
userAgreement.userConduct:
2.1 When using this application, you must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
2.2 You shall not use this application for any illegal or improper activities, including but not limited to:
- Publishing, transmitting, disseminating, or storing content that is harassing, defamatory, abusive, intimidating, obscene, violent, or violates any laws, regulations, public order, or social ethics.
- Infringing on the intellectual property rights, trade secrets, portrait rights, privacy rights, and other legal rights of others.
- Engaging in any behavior that endangers computer network security.
userAgreement.intellectualProperty: All copyrights, trademark rights, patent rights, trade secrets, and other intellectual property rights of this application, as well as all information content related to this application (including but not limited to text, images, audio, video, charts, interface design, layout framework, related data, or electronic documents) are protected by law and belong to this application.
userAgreement.disclaimer:
4.1 You understand and agree that the services provided by this application are provided 'as is' based on current technology and conditions. We will do our best to provide you with services and ensure their continuity and security; however, we cannot always foresee and prevent legal, technical, and other risks, including but not limited to force majeure, viruses, trojans, hacker attacks, system instability, third-party service defects, government actions, and other reasons that may lead to service interruption, data loss, and other losses and risks.
4.2 We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, derivative, or punitive damages or losses arising from your use of this service.
userAgreement.agreementChangesTitle: 5. Changes and Termination of the Agreement
userAgreement.agreementChanges:
5.1 We have the right to modify the terms of this agreement when necessary. You can review the relevant agreement terms in the latest version of this application.
5.2 If you continue to use this application after the terms of this agreement have been modified, you are deemed to have accepted the modified agreement.
userAgreement.legalDisclaimer: *This agreement is a sample template and does not constitute a formal legal document. Please modify it according to your actual situation under the guidance of a legal professional.
